title: September
marks: Signature and Date LRC, in brown: [Alex Fournier 89.]
text: It has been suggested that the site of this painting is near the Louisville swamp, south of Carver, Minnesota, nestled in the Minnesota River Valley.
description: landscape with trees at left and right in background; hunter with a rifle over his shoulder, accompanied by a dog, at center on a dirt trail
creditline: Gift of Don and Diana Lee Lucker
